segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen scene, and it makes my heart race a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that wobbly stool looks like he's about to topple over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far to grab those cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him is just waiting with her hand out, not even steadying the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the mom is right there by the sink, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the sink, soaking the floor and her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips, or if the boy falls, it could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are open, and dishes are stacked nearby, ready to crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden is calm, but here it's tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids seem so carefree, but I can't help worrying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup screams accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the woman looking around?
segments.speaker: PAR
